COMMENT_TX: $Hack hit by foul liner, had to leave game
$First night game at the Polo Grounds
$Demaree tripped over first base and hurt his shoulder, left game next inning
$Witek was going with the pitch on 3-2. The pitch was ball 4, but Davis threw to 2B anyway, the throw going into CF.
ej,vaugha101,P,campb901,call at 2B $Vaughan was ejected for arguing that Gustine's throw had not pulled him off the bag at 2B.
Line drive over DiMaggio's head that landed behind the Eddie Grant memorial 460 feet from home plate
$The return throw from Witek got away from Danning and Vaughan tried to reach third but was thrown out by Danning.
$Billy Jurges left with an injured hand
ej,wilsj105,C,mageg901,Checked swing $Mike Dejan called out on a checked swing; Reds Coach Jimmie Wilson ejected by HP umpire George Magerkurth
ej,browj110,P,stewb901,Call at 1B Jumbo Brown ejected by 1B umpire Bill Stewart
$Reds catcher Willard Hershberger, distraught that he 'called the wrong pitch' on the game-ending home run by Harry Danning, committed suicide in his Boston hotel room on August 3
$Cardinals claimed fan interference, umpires allowed home run.
RF Klein dropped line drive, but was able to get force
